response.overview: Under the hideous shadow of Nazi-occupied France in 1942, a man named Jacques uses a radio to broadcast messages of hope. Little does he know that the formidable Gestapo captain Klaus Jager has been sent to end the illegal broadcasts. As Klaus approaches, Jacques, his daughter and a small group of other dissidents must risk everything, relying on the goodness of an unknown man, to survive.
response.title: burning at both end
